resources.string:
Voltage conversion result:

Voltage value: %1$s
Unit voltage from: %2$s
Unit voltage to: %3$s

Conversion result: %4$s

Voltage Conversion is a mini project application that allows users to quickly and easily convert voltage values between three different units of measurement: Volt (V), Kilovolt (kV), and Megavolt (MV). With three required inputs - the voltage value, the unit of origin, and the target unit - users can smoothly calculate voltage conversions as needed. This application provides convenience and practicality in managing voltage calculations, making it a useful tool for technicians, engineers, or anyone involved in work involving electrical and electronic equipment.
